artist: Editor: Nell Bernstein et al.; Publisher: Pacific New Service, San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched biding, text, designs, and an image of a dog lying on the street, on ground that looks like a crumpled piece of brown paper; 108 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: The Freedom Manual: A Roadmap for Roaddawgz
